alert.note: Alert for Bee; Duval; Goliad; Inland Calhoun; Inland Refugio; Jim Wells; La Salle; Live Oak; McMullen; Victoria (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Hard Freeze Warning issued December 25 at 2:51AM CST until December 25 at 10:00AM CST by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CST THIS MORNING... ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM CST MONDAY... * WHAT...For the Hard Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 22. For the Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 27 expected. * WHERE...La Salle, McMullen, Live Oak, Bee, Goliad, Victoria, Duval, Jim Wells, Inland Refugio and Inland Calhoun Counties. * WHEN...For the Hard Freeze Warning, until 10 AM CST this morning. For the Freeze Warning, from 11 PM this evening to 9 AM CST Monday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Bee; Duval; Goliad; Inland Calhoun; Inland Refugio; Jim Wells; La Salle; Live Oak; McMullen; Victoria
